title: 联机无限报错求助
author: shwsun
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Unexpected error
This error has been saved to G:\mc\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-12-21_00.37.38-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone. 


提示如上，详细情况为在服务器里玩的时候使用传送指令前后一段时间掉线，之后这个ID就无限掉线或者无限报错。换个ID才会好。
